experience.title: Intern
experience.description: ‚Ä¢ Conducted an in-depth research on customer acquisition and retention strategies adopted by corporates, analyzing data from companies across various industries‚Ä¢ Focused on KPIs like CAC in relation to other metrics, such as CLV and ROI, to gain a better understanding of the company's performance. Identified cost-saving opportunities by reducing CAC by 15% and improving CLV by 10%‚Ä¢ Compared acquisition marketing strategies with brand awareness initiatives, analyzing data from 50 campaigns. Identified that acquisition marketing campaigns resulted in a 25% higher conversion rate compared to brand awareness campaigns
